main.name: Viona Kaleb
main.bio: Hello! I'm a Bachelor of Computer Science (B.Sc), and currently a postgraduate student (M.Sc). Being a Front-End Developer since 2018, I mainly use; ReactJS, NextJS, Typescript for front-end tech stack.

resume.skillmessage: The tasks are to: Translate designs from UI/UX, and develop them into web apps. Create logically functioning features, and integrate API data from BE.

education.description: Studying Master of Computer Science in IT.
Graduated Bachelor of Computer Science in IT.

work.title: Front-End Developer
work.description: Using ReactJS, Typescript, RTK Query, Redux and Hooks: Develop back-office for logistic, supply chain, and e-commerce web. Create logic functionality to consume API data from BE. Translate designs from Figma to web apps. Create unit test with Jest & React Testing Library.

work.title: Front-End Developer
work.description: Using ReactJS, Typescript, NextJS and Apollo GraphQL: Maintain and develop a tournament platform in both web and mobile responsive.vDevelop an admin back-office.

work.title: Front-End Developer
work.description: Worked fully remote on Adactive Asia, a Singapore-based company. Using ReactJS, React Hooks, LESS, Canvas, GSAP, and webOS: Create wayfinding apps for touchscreen display, installed in Singapore buildings. Develop apps for LG Smart TVs.

work.title: Front-End Developer
work.description: Using VueJS, Vuex, BootstrapVue and NuxtJS: Maintain and revamp web platform for esports tournaments. Develop single-page apps for project microsites.
